about_the_game:
Metroidvania
The game has 8 areas with different styles. Players will freely explore the entire game world, unlock new abilities, and explore this unknown and mysterious science fiction world step by step.

Multiple abilities
Various abilities such as hook rope, super rush, and time reversal make you even more powerful in combat and exploration.

2D action game
Just the right rebound can bring huge benefits, and the refreshing battle tests the player's skills and courage.

Time back
Falling boxes, collapsing walls, and collapsed bridges can be activated to move in reverse, introducing the dimension of time into a map similar to the Metroidvania, bringing a brand new experience.

Chip matching
Are you troubled by the fact that you cannot use the enhanced content you have collected through all your hard work? Here, the chip will have more than one strengthening effect, and you can combine them in any way to create a new skill effect. With more than a hundred combinations, every new collection will usher in endless possibilities.

name: Rust Song 锈歌

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or later
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore this unique sci-fi style metroidvania-like adventure world. You can acquire a variety of abilities to explore the world and assemble powerful chip combinations. You'll also have the ability to go back in time to change the map's structure and unlock shortcuts.
